question: Who has been appointed as the new Chairman of National School of Drama (NSD)?
explanation:
Noted film actor and theatre artist Paresh Rawal has been appointed chairperson of National School of Drama (NSD).
The former BJP Member of Parliament, will succeed the present Chairman Arjun Deo Charan. Paresh Rawal, has been awarded with Padma Shri in 2014. The NSD is Indiaâ€™s premier institute for theatre students and is located at Delhi.
